title: How to push mid lane properly
body:
I really enjoy playing In the mid lane especially Syndra but I'm always to scared to push the lane if my opponent has recalled or died or missing because I seem to always get ganked wether I ward or not. So I'm hopping for some tips so I can push the lane correctly and take the tower without dying.

Thanks

P.S syndra is the best ;P

replies.body:
Greetings Chinchun2002,

This is is something that I struggled with for a long time. As a Syndra however you are in an interesting case that you can clear a miniom wave quite easily with an Q and W. 

In the case of the example you have given, when you have killed the enemy laner or they have gone missing and want to push I would say that it depends on 3 things. The first of which being your HP Value (if you are low after killing them it can make things quite hard.), The information you have about the location of the enemy jungler and where your location.

Based on the answer to these questions it can effect what you choose to do. Often the safe choice is to use a combo on the waves and recall without pushing up too far but enough so that wave crashes into the tower.

---

There are some things to make I easier though. You will notice that a lot of high elos mid laners like to get an defensive item early on in the game. The main reason for them doing this is so that when they fight with the enemy laner they will have more hp coming out of it, letting them push the wave and survive the enemies brust combo instead of getting one shot.

Doing this also lets you do fun things such as setting up fights easier in the late game because of your extra defensive stats and taking enemy jungler camps between waves if you push them.

---

As a side note when the enemy laner is roaming or you want to roam, a strategy that you can use/be aware of is some mid laners like to roam to a side of the river that isnt warded and wait in a bush to ambush you when you try to counter roam. In the case of them not following you can call your jungler to come kill the enemy mid laners that is probably over extended pushing or finish your roam.

---

I hope that this helps if there is any other questions I can answer or any way i can lend a hand let me know. Good luck in your games!

~Elam

If Syndra started an early defensive item, wouldn't she be completely useless? Effective magical health won't mean jack shit if she can't do anything in the trades. She'll just die slower while doing less, no?

I apologize when I was explaining that I should have clarified that by defensive items on Syndra I mean the likes of Zonyas or Abyssal.

I hope that makes a bit more sense now xD
That makes a lot more sense xD
Thanks for all the constructive feedback ;)

If you want to shove tower you need vision of enemies. 

-Can you see bot and toplaners? 
-Have you seen the enemy jungler recently and is your jungler close enough to help you? 
-Do you have enough mana for a full combo? 

If the answer is no to any of these questions then you should probably just crash wave.
